import React from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; const Latest = (props) => { const Open = () => setShowPopup(true); const Close = () => setShowPopup(false); return (
{result.original_title}({result.release_date.substring(0, 4)})

{result.vote_average}

{result.original_language}

{result.overview}
{cast.map((cast) => ( ))}
); }; export default Latest;
